content: - work 1 half_double_crochet in each of next 2 1 double_crochet in each of next 4 1 half_double_crochet in each of next 2 1 single_crochet in next 1 half_double_crochet in end chain 2 work 1 half_double_crochet in same now we will continue so we are working around in a circle the next step will be on the opposite side of the starting chain - work 2 double_crochet in first chain 1 double_crochet in each of next 5 1 half_double_crochet in each of next 3 1 double_crochet in end 1 half_double_crochet in the end 1 single_crochet in next 1 half_double_crochet in next you are now at a corner continue working around in a circle - work 2 single_crochet in corner 1 half_double_crochet in each of next 3 2 half_double_crochet in next 1 single_crochet in each of next 3 1 slip_stitch in each of next 3 do not cut yarn you will now work the tentacles chain 9 1 single_crochet in 2nd chain from hook 1 single_crochet in each of next 5 2 single_crochet in next 1 single_crochet in next join with slip_stitch to body of octopus in the same stitch you started working the chain -chain 22 1 single_crochet in 2nd chain from hook 2 single_crochet in next 1 single_crochet in octopus or squid neck charm each of next 17 2 single_crochet in next 1 single_crochet in next slip_stitch to next stitch on body design by midnight knitter copyright 2006 not to be reproduced without permission -chain 18 1 single_crochet in 2nd chain from hook 1 single_crochet in each of next 7 2 single_crochet in next 1 single_crochet in each of next 5 2 single_crochet in next 1 single_crochet in next slip_stitch to same stitch on body materials -chain 11 1 single_crochet in 2nd chain from hook 1 single_crochet in next 2 single_crochet in yarn karabella vintage cotton next 1 single_crochet in each of next 4 2 single_crochet in next 1 single_crochet in each of next 2 slip_stitch to next stitch on body crochet hook size e 3 5mm -chain 10 1 single_crochet in 2nd chain from hook 1 single_crochet in each of next 2 this novelty pattern works well with almost any yarn 2 single_crochet in next 1 single_crochet in each of next 2 2 single_crochet in next 1 single_crochet in make sure to choose a hook size about 2 sizes smaller next slip_stitch to next stitch on body than recommended on the label to get a tight crochet make one more tentacle abbreviations turn octopus over so that you are looking at the wrong chain = chain side slip_stitch over to the center of the tentacles where they st s = stitch es attach to the body you may have a hole between the in next = in next stitch body and the tentacles slip_stitch between this to tighten it single_crochet = single_crochet up then half_double_crochet = half_double_crochet - chain 26 1 single_crochet in 2nd chain from hook 1 single_crochet in each of next 2 double_crochet = double_crochet 2
